sections.title: Exploration System
sections.description: Complete exploration system for wilderness territories including Discovery Points, exploration checks, locations, way signs, character actions, rewards, and territory creation guidelines

sections.title: Carrying Capacity and Encumbrance
includes_subheadings: ### Armor and Encumbrance for Other Base Speeds
sections.description: Rules for encumbrance by armor and weight, carrying capacity by Strength score, lifting and dragging limits, size modifiers for creatures, and speed penalties for different load levels

sections.title: Movement and Distance
sections.description: Movement at different scales including tactical, local, and overland movement with rules for walking, hustling, running, terrain effects, forced marches, mounted movement, and waterborne travel

sections.title: Evasion and Pursuit
sections.description: Rules for chases and pursuit including opposed ability checks for equal speed situations and extended overland chases

sections.title: Vision and Light
sections.description: Complete lighting rules covering bright light, normal light, dim light, and darkness with effects on visibility, concealment, stealth, and special vision types like darkvision and low-light vision

sections.title: Breaking and Entering
sections.description: Rules for destroying objects including smashing with weapons, breaking with strength, armor class of objects, hardness, hit points, energy attacks, magic item durability, and break DCs
